page.title: 16Recreation Centre, St Ives
page.content: Six hundred thousand people, of all ages, use the St Ivo Recreation Centre in a year. It costs a quarter of a million pounds to run. It provides a centre for all kinds of sport and entertainment for people from a wide area. Although it makes a loss, one of the public, a pensioner, thinks it is money well spent. He sets aside an hour every day for weight training and swimming to help him keep fit and enjoy his retirement. Whole families use the centre and the five children who researched this report use it for Judo, racket ball, swimming, tennis, athletics and roller skating. Swimming is the most popular sport. Many people enjoy music, discos, dances, drama, and exhibitions in the large entertainment hall. We are lucky to have this centre in our area.
